events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the product I did not order.
The support system has identified this issue as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Your case has been assigned to a customer support agent who will assist you with your refund.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received wrong item so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, the order number is 556789012 and attached is the photo of the item I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send a return label for the incorrect item.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Looking forward to receiving the return label soon.
The refund has been processed and a return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and that everything is going well with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and returned the item yesterday. Thank you for your help!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Your case is now closed, and we thank you for reaching out to support.
